entries.entry: I'm learning how to make an edit button so that I can update any of my older posts

We recently finished a project that involved taking several API's and using them to populate 3 dropdown menu's (eatery, attraction, and national park). We then used a weather API to grab the weather relative to the location of the selected park and then allowed the user to save this list of chosen items into an itinerary.
I'm currently trying to fix the layout of my journal because its currently a dumpster fire.
